title: Let's play a forum game
body:
Ok you have to name a champ that requires 5 IQ to play then the next person has to say why they're easy to play. I'll start

Annie.

replies.body:
WW.

You don't even need 5 IQ...

You can play that mofo on a stable 500 ping if you want...

Yeah, yeah, just r.

Teemo (I had to do it)

Press R and if your lagging, just stand still and they can't kill you, kinda

Riven

shes not....you just suck arse at LOL.

bard.

All you do is press RQW and they're dead.

How would you know you're bronze.
